code:
flowchart TD
    Start([User Has Legacy Export]) --> Check{Determine Type}
    
    Check -- "XML (Forms/Menu/OLB)" --> Forms[Convert Form]
    Forms --> CmdForms[/"node src/convert-forms-xml-to-markdown.js --file [path/to/file.xml]"/]
    CmdForms -- "Output: [output_dir]/[module].md" --> Docs[(Markdown)]
    
    Check -- "XML (Reports)" --> Reports[Convert Report]
    Reports --> CmdReports[/"node src/convert-report-xml-to-markdown.js --file [path/to/report.xml]"/]
    CmdReports -- "Output: [output_dir]/[report].md" --> Docs
    
    Check -- "TXT (Library)" --> Libs[Convert Library]
    Libs --> CmdLibs[/"node src/convert-pll-to-markdown.js --file [path/to/lib.txt]"/]
    CmdLibs -- "Output: [output_dir]/[lib].md" --> Docs
    
    Docs --> Validate{Check Output}
    Validate -- Errors --> Debug[Verbose Mode]
    Debug --> CmdDebug[/"--verbose"/]
    Validate -- OK --> Done([Analysis Ready])
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
